name: Classic Apple Pie
description: A traditional lattice-top apple pie with cinnamon and nutmeg.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Peel and slice apples. Mix with sugar, flour, and spices. Pour into pastry-lined plate. Top with second crust. Bake for 45 minutes.

name: Banana Bread
description: Moist and flavorful bread made with overripe bananas.
instructions: Mash bananas. Stir in butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla. Mix in flour. Pour into loaf pan. Bake at 350°F for 1 hour.
